title: Housemate Agreement
description: A comprehensive agreement for living with housemates, covering rent, chores, guests, and more.

sections.title: Rent & Bills
terms: All housemates agree to split rent equally unless otherwise specified.
Utility bills (electricity, water, internet, gas) will be divided equally.
Rent and bills must be paid by the 1st of each month to the designated housemate/landlord.
Late payments beyond 5 days will require informing all housemates.
If a housemate moves out, they are responsible for their share until a replacement is found.

sections.title: Chores & Cleaning
terms: Each housemate will take turns cleaning shared spaces weekly (kitchen, bathroom, living room).
Kitchen must be cleaned after cooking, including dishes and surfaces.
Garbage duty rotates daily among housemates, with bins taken out on collection day.
Neglected chores may be reassigned or resolved in a house meeting.
Everyone agrees to keep personal items out of shared spaces.

sections.title: Noise & Quiet Hours
terms: Quiet hours are from 11 PM to 7 AM on weekdays and 1 AM to 9 AM on weekends.
Music, parties, and loud gatherings require housemate approval in advance.
Headphones must be used for late-night gaming, music, or calls.
Housemates agree to respect sleep, study, and work schedules.

sections.title: Guests & Visitors
terms: Housemates must give at least 24 hours' notice before bringing overnight guests.
Guests staying more than 3 nights in a week require group approval.
Housemates are responsible for their guests’ behavior and damages.
Guests may not use another housemate’s personal items without permission.

sections.title: Shared Supplies
terms: Toilet paper, cleaning products, and other shared supplies will be bought jointly.
Costs for supplies will be split equally among all housemates.
If someone uses significantly more of a shared item, they agree to contribute extra.
All purchases will be tracked in a shared expense app or log.

sections.title: Food & Kitchen Use
terms: Each housemate’s food is their own unless explicitly shared.
Shared cooking staples (oil, salt, spices) will be bought jointly.
Fridge and cupboard space will be divided equally.
Housemates agree not to take food that isn’t theirs without permission.

sections.title: Dispute Resolution
terms: Disagreements will be discussed openly during house meetings.
If unresolved, housemates agree to a majority vote.
For ongoing conflicts, housemates may bring in an external mediator (friend, landlord, RA).
Everyone commits to respectful communication and avoiding passive-aggressive behavior.
